label: Ensure token or service map is used to access the specific Repositories in Registry
description: if access must be restricted only to specific repositories in a container registry then Tokens and scope maps must be used to manage access instead of managed identities . By creating tokens, registry owner can provide users or services with scoped, time-limited access to repositories to pull or push images or perform other actions. A token provides more fine-grained permissions than other registry authentication options, which scope permissions to an entire registry.
link: link to terrform line/comment where requirement is implemented
